message:
We started working on this idea on Friday Night, and its been an awesome experience! We appreciate any feedback about the site, the idea and our pitch deck ( http://www.slideshare.net/DFectuoso1/shoutatweet2 ).

We are presenting at 6:30ish, so any feedback is awesome!
